channel.title: 404 on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in 404 on Chaotic Online

item.title: 404 Testing Page
item.description: This page MUST NOT be included among the production files. While on Development Mode, be it by commenting the FrontMatter Parameter draft or by running Hugo Server with its --buildDrafts option, this Page helps testing the functionality of a 404 Page. After compiled, move the index.html file within the 404 directory to the root and rename it to 404.html or whatever your server requires to interpret it as a 404 file.
